TestFrame.Name: SetSampleCount
TestFrame.TemplateText: --******************&#013-- Send sample count, 50Hz&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0000 + 12 EE &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0001 + 12 01 --01 Write&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0002 + 12 0E --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0003 + 12 00 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0004 + 12 46 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0005 + 12 00 --Data&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0006 + 12 00 --Data &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0059 00 LASTBYTE&#013&#013--Interframe Gap Time: 1000 ns&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0060 &#013&#013-- Sample Count&#013-- Modifer: IncLimit 01&#013-- 0ffset 6 dec-&#076 6 hex&#013-- datawidth 0016&#013-- XthFrame 0000 &#013-- XthFrameOffset 0000&#013-- Endvalue 3999dec -&#076 0F9Fhex&#013-- StartValue 0&#013ETH PORTX SENDMODIFY 01 0011 0016 000e 0000 0F9F 0000&#013WAIT FOR ns 100&#013&#013--******************&#013-- Send sample value A low byte, 50Hz&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0062 + 12 EE &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0063 + 12 01 --01 Write&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0064 + 12 0E --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0065 + 12 00 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0066 + 12 4A --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0067 + 12 00 --Data&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0068 + 12 00 --Data &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0121 00 LASTBYTE&#013&#013--Interframe Gap Time: 1000 ns&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0122 &#013&#013-- Sample value measurment&#013-- Modifer: IncLimit 01&#013-- 0ffset 5dec-&#076 5hex&#013-- datawidth 0016&#013-- XthFrame 0000 &#013-- XthFrameOffset 0000&#013-- Endvalue 3999dec -&#076 0F9Fhex&#013-- StartValue 0&#013ETH PORTX SENDMODIFY 01 0011 0016 000e 0001 ffff 0000&#013&#013--******************&#013-- Send sample value A high byte, 50Hz&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0124 + 12 EE &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0125 + 12 01 --01 Write&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0126 + 12 0E --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0127 + 12 00 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0128 + 12 4C --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0129 + 12 00 --Data&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0130 + 12 00 --Data &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0183 00 LASTBYTE&#013&#013--Interframe Gap Time: 1000 ns&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0184 &#013&#013--******************&#013-- Send sample value A quality, 50Hz&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0186 + 12 EE &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0187 + 12 01 --01 Write&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0188 + 12 0E --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0189 + 12 00 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0190 + 12 4E --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0191 + 12 00 --Data&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0192 + 12 00 --Data &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0245 00 LASTBYTE&#013&#013--Interframe Gap Time: 1000 ns&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0256 &#013&#013--******************&#013-- Send sample value B low byte, 50Hz&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0248 + 12 EE &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0249 + 12 01 --01 Write&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0250 + 12 0E --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0251 + 12 00 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0252 + 12 50 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0253 + 12 00 --Data&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0254 + 12 bb --Data &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0307 00 LASTBYTE&#013&#013--Interframe Gap Time: 1000 ns&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0308&#013&#013-- Sample value measurment&#013-- Modifer: IncLimit 01&#013-- 0ffset 5dec-&#076 5hex&#013-- datawidth 0016&#013-- XthFrame 0000 &#013-- XthFrameOffset 0000&#013-- Endvalue 3999dec -&#076 0F9Fhex&#013-- StartValue 0&#013ETH PORTX SENDMODIFY 01 0011 0016 000e 0004 ffff 0000&#013&#013--******************&#013-- Send sample value B high byte, 50Hz&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0310 + 12 EE &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0311 + 12 01 --01 Write&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0312 + 12 0E --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0313 + 12 00 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0314 + 12 52 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0315 + 12 00 --Data&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0316 + 12 00 --Data &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0369 00 LASTBYTE&#013&#013--Interframe Gap Time: 1000 ns&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0370&#013&#013--******************&#013-- Send sample value B quality, 50Hz&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0372 + 12 EE SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0432&#013&#013--******************&#013-- Send sample value C low byte, 50Hz&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0434 + 12 EE &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0435 + 12 01 --01 Write&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0436 + 12 0E --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0437 + 12 00 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0438 + 12 56 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0439 + 12 0f --Data&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0440 + 12 cc --Data &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0493 00 LASTBYTE&#013&#013--Interframe Gap Time: 1000 ns&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0494&#013&#013-- Sample value measurment&#013-- SENDMODIFY 01 0011 0016 000e 0007 ffff 0000&#013--WAIT FOR ns 100&#013&#013--******************&#013-- Send sample value C high byte, 50Hz&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0496 + 12 EE &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0561 + 12 00 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0562 + 12 5A --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0563 + 12 00 --Data&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0564 + 12 00 --Data 1000 ns&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0680&#013&#013-- Sample value measurment&#013-- Modifer: IncLimit 01&#013-- 0ffset 5dec-&#076 5hex&#013-- datawidth 0016&#013-- XthFrame 0000 &#013-- XthFrameOffset 0000&#013-- Endvalue 3999dec -&#076 0F9Fhex&#013-- StartValue 0&#013--ETH PORTX SENDMODIFY 01 0011 0016 000e 000A ffff 0000&#013--WAIT FOR ns 100&#013&#013--******************&#013-- Send sample value N high byte, 50Hz&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0682 + 12 EE &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0683 + 12 01 --01 Write&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0684 + 12 0E --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0685 + 12 00 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0686 + 12 5E --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0687 + 12 00 --Data&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0688 + 12 00 --Data &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0741 00 address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0749 + 12 00 --Data&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0750 + 12 00 --Data &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0803 00 LASTBYTE&#013&#013--Interframe Gap Time: 1000 ns&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0804 &#013&#013--******************&#013-- Release the SV frames&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0806 + 12 EE &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0807 + 12 01 --01 Write&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0808 + 12 0E --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0809 + 12 00 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0810 + 12 34 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0811 + 12 00 --Data&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0812 + 12 01 --Data --Release&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0865 00 LASTBYTE&#013&#013--Interframe Gap Time: 1000 ns&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0866
